message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CY

This paper belongs to the arXiv CS sub-category of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Information Retrieval (IR) as it involves the analysis of news articles and the generation of media profiles using intelligent analysis tools. The use of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to automatically detect propagandistic content and determine the stance of an article with respect to controversial topics suggests that it also falls under the sub-categories of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Social and Information Networks (SI). Additionally, the focus on media profiles and the analysis of news outlets suggests that it may also belong to the sub-categories of Cybersecurity (CY) and Human-Computer Interaction (HCI).
